page.title: 12Loughborough University.
page.content: {Loughborough University of Technology} is an almost self-contained campus university a mile to the west of the town,in delightful Leicestershire countryside on the edge of{Charnwood } {Forest.}The campus is one of the finest in Britain and the largest in Europe, extending over {210 acres. } There are many courses which sustain its high reputation ie. engineering, the applied sciences and technology. {The Pilkington Library,}opened in {1980,}is equipped with the most modern facilities and aids to study and research.{ In{physical education,}Loughborough's prowess is internationally recognised. Perhaps their most successful athlete has been{Sebastian Coe,}an{Olympic } {champion,}and who was a research worker in the Department of Physical Education and Sports Science.
